text: Kitabidera madhye yara kuphari karechila tini'i taderake prathama samabesera jan'ya tadera abasabhumi theke bitarita karechilena [1]. Tomara kalpana'o karani ye, tara beriye yabe. Ara tara mane karechila ye, tadera durgagulo tadera raksa karabe allahara pakara'o theke; kintu allaha tadera kache emanabhabe asalena ya tara kalpana'o kareni. Ara tini tadera antare trasera sancara karalena. Phale tara dhbansa kare phelala nijedera bari-ghara nijedera hate ebam muminadera hate'o [2]; ata'eba he caksusmana byaktigana!
